events.title: Bithumb $44B Bitcoin Error Triggers FSC Emergency Review
events.summary: South Korean exchange Bithumb accidentally sent 620,000 BTC ($44B) to 249 users during promotional event. FSC convened emergency meeting, announced on-site inspections of crypto exchanges to review internal control systems and asset holdings.

events.title: Japan Unveils Crypto Tax Cut & ETF Roadmap to 2028
events.summary: Japan announces sweeping crypto reforms: tax rate reduction from 55% to 20% by 2028, reclassifying 105 cryptocurrencies as financial products, and launching crypto ETFs by 2028.

events.title: Stablecoin Inflows Surge to $100B Amid Crypto Market Correction
events.summary: Stablecoin inflows on exchanges doubled to $100B despite ongoing crypto sell-off, indicating institutional positioning for potential market recovery.

events.title: South Korea Deploys AI Surveillance for Crypto Market Monitoring
events.summary: South Korean regulators deploy AI-powered surveillance systems to monitor cryptocurrency markets for manipulation and fraud in real-time.

events.title: China Establishes Legal Framework for RWA Tokenization
events.summary: Beijing announces clear separation between banned virtual currencies and RWA tokenization, with RWA being included in regulatory framework. First sign of legal recognition for tokenized real-world assets in China.

events.title: IG Group Completes Acquisition of Independent Reserve
events.summary: London-listed IG Group completes acquisition of MAS-licensed Independent Reserve, plans to launch crypto trading services in Singapore, Australia, and UAE in H2 2026.

events.title: FSTB Confirms 2026 VASP Custody & Dealer Legislation
events.summary: Hong Kong's Financial Services and Treasury Bureau confirms comprehensive legislation for virtual asset custodians and dealers by end of 2026.

events.title: First ETH Staking ETF Launched in Hong Kong
events.summary: ChinaAMC partners with OSL to launch world's first regulated ETH Staking ETF, offering ~2.8% APR through compliant vehicle.

events.title: MAS Project Guardian Phase 2 Expansion
events.summary: Monetary Authority of Singapore expands institutional DeFi pilots to include ETH-based lending protocols and tokenized bonds.

events.title: Japan FSA Clarifies Staking Tax Treatment
events.summary: Japan FSA issues guidance treating staking rewards as miscellaneous income at time of receipt.

events.title: Hong Kong Approves Spot ETH ETFs
events.summary: SFC approves multiple spot Ethereum ETFs for HKEX trading.

events.title: Singapore MAS Issues Staking Guidelines
events.summary: MAS requires licensed staking services to segregate assets and maintain insurance.

events.title: Binance Obtains Japan Re-entry License
events.summary: Binance receives FSA approval to resume operations in Japan after 2023 exit.

events.title: OKX Receives Singapore MPI License
events.summary: OKX obtains Major Payment Institution license from MAS for Singapore operations.

events.title: SFC Signals DeFi Sandbox Intent
events.summary: Securities and Futures Commission indicates plans for DeFi regulatory sandbox.

events.title: South Korea Implements VAUPA
events.summary: Virtual Asset User Protection Act takes effect with enhanced investor protections.

events.title: Japan Web3 National Strategy Update
events.summary: Government updates Web3 strategy emphasizing ecosystem development and institutional adoption.

events.title: Hong Kong VASP Regime Fully Effective
events.summary: Full VASP licensing under AMLO becomes mandatory for all crypto exchanges.
